Sentencas: A high-temperature neutron diffraction study of La0.75Nd0.25CrO3 compound has been carried out in the temperature range 300-1400 K.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: The sample has been studied for its structural stability of the two observed crystallographic phases at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: It was found to contain orthorhombic and rhombohedral phases with weight percentages 85% and 15%, respectively, at ambient temperature.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: It was observed that the two phases coexist even up to 1400 K; however, the fraction of the rhombohedral phase increases with increasing temperature at the expense of the orthorhombic phase.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: At 1400 K, the weight fractions of the orthorhombic and rhombohedral phases are about 11% and 89%, respectively.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: This study reveals a negative thermal expansion along the b-axis for the orthorhombic phase and along the c-axis for the rhombohedral phase from 950 K up to 1200 K, where a rapid transformation of one phase to the other occurs.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: Below 950 K as well as above 1200 K, both the phases show a normal positive thermal expansion.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: The La-La and Cr-Cr bond distances show an abrupt drop from 950 K up to 1200 K and a sharp rise after that, which corroborates the negative thermal expansion of the cell volume and b-axis of the orthorhombic phase.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: The Cr-Cr distance in the rhombohedral phase shows a reduction in magnitude in the temperature range 950-1200 K, explaining the negative thermal expansion of the c-axis of this phase.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: The coefficients of volume thermal expansion and linear thermal expansion have been determined for both the phases.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study

Sentencas: The significance of the present study has been discussed for practical applications of the studied compound in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural stability of orthorhombic and rhombohedral La0.75Nd0.25CrO3:: a high-temperature neutron diffraction study
